entry.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 46D00 / 46D01 incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 17, 15:17 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific racks.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 17/02/2026 14:57 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the racks 46D00 and 46D01 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
